name: Die In The Dark
description: Die in the Dark is a first-person exploration and adventure game inspired by real life events! Trapped in the subway with zombies, vicious dogs, and a slew of other monsters. Can you escape the puzzles and survive the monsters of Plum Island?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+, 8, 10 Processor: 1.80GHz Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with DX9 (shader model 4.0) capabilities Storage: 2 GB available space
